event.title: UPSC Drug Inspectors Notification 2018
event.description:
UPSC Drug Inspectors Recruitment 2018 – Union Public Service Commission has issued Notification for the Recruitment of Assistant Public Prosecutor/Workshop Superintendent/Training & Placement Officer/Assistant Professor (Civil/Fire Engineering),Principal/Legal Advisor-cum-Standing Counsel), Head of Department (IT)/Assistant Director Gr-I (Technical)/Specialist Gr-III (Assistant Professor-Physiology/Plastic Surgery), Manager (Marketing & Trade),Drug Inspector/Administrative Officer posts.Eligible candidates may apply through Online Application reach on before Online Registration Last Date : 03.05.2018, Print Copy, Documents Submission Last Date : 04.05.2018 Official Website http://www.upsc.gov.in/whats-new/07%20-%202018 Further details of Age, pay Scale, Fee & other details see on below..

Union Public Service Commission Assistant Public Prosecutor/Workshop Superintendent/Training & Placement Officer/Assistant Professor (Civil/Fire Engineering),Principal/Legal Advisor-cum-Standing Counsel), Head of Department (IT)/Assistant Director Gr-I (Technical)/Specialist Gr-III (Assistant Professor-Physiology/Plastic Surgery), Manager (Marketing & Trade),Drug Inspector/Administrative Officer posts
Important Dates :
Application submission last date : : Online Registration Last Date : 03.05.2018, Print Copy, Documents Submission Last Date : 04.05.2018
Post Name: Assistant Public Prosecutor/Workshop Superintendent/Training & Placement Officer/Assistant Professor (Civil/Fire Engineering),Principal/Legal Advisor-cum-Standing Counsel), Head of Department (IT)/Assistant Director Gr-I (Technical)/Specialist Gr-III (Assistant Professor-Physiology/Plastic Surgery), Manager (Marketing & Trade),Drug Inspector/Administrative Officer posts
Vacancy Details: Total 120 Assistant Public Prosecutor/Workshop Superintendent/Training & Placement Officer/Assistant Professor (Civil/Fire Engineering),Principal/Legal Advisor-cum-Standing Counsel), Head of Department (IT)/Assistant Director Gr-I (Technical)/Specialist Gr-III (Assistant Professor-Physiology/Plastic Surgery), Manager (Marketing & Trade),Drug Inspector/Administrative Officer posts
Type of Apply: Online
Education Qualifications : Graduation in Pharmacy orPharmaceutical Science or in Medicine with specialization in Clinical Pharmacology/Microbiology from University established in India by law
Age Limit as on : age between 35 years (Assistant Public Prosecutor/Workshop Superintendent/Training & Placement Officer/Assistant Professor-Civil/Fire Engineering), 50 years (Principal/Legal Advisor-cum-Standing Counsel), 40 years (Head of Department-IT/Assistant Director Gr-I-Technical/Specialist Gr-III, Assistant Professor (Physiology/Plastic Surgery/Manager-Marketing & Trade), 30 years (Drug Inspector/Administrative Officer)

Age Relaxation
OBC for : Relaxation Applicable
SC/ST/ : Relaxation Applicable
PH for : Relaxation Applicable
Pay Scale : Rs.15600-39100/- (Workshop Superintendent/Training & Placement Officer/Assistant Professor-Civil/Fire Engineering/Specialist Gr-III-Assistant Professor (Plastic Surgery), Rs.37400-67000/- (Principal/Head of Department-IT), Rs.9300-34800/- (Administrative Officer/Assistant Geologist),
Selection procedure : Recruitment Test, Interview marks
Fees Payment Mode : Fee in any branch of the SBI by cash or by using Net Banking facility of the SBI or by using Visa/Master Credit/Debit card system
General for : Rs.25/-
OBC for : Rs.25/-
SC/ST : Nil
PH for : Nil
PH for : Nil

Check Application Form Apply Now

Visit official Website
Apply Mode : Online: only

How to Apply :Candidates are required to apply online from UPSC online official website and filled all details of application submit on before 03.05.2018
